enterData: Enter dates and test results to display a graph of the results
changingModel: You are now changing the model to {target}, confirm to change.
add_data: Add test results to see the graph
add_to_tests: Add at least 2 samples to generate a graph
graph_description: Showing the result of the samples in the last {date}
interpretation_description: Start adding samples to see the interpretation
warning_30_days: Warning! Too large a gap between tests.
warning_30_days_description: Between the last entered and the newest sample, there are more than 30 days. This exceeds the model's limits. Ensure that there are no more than 30 days between each test.
less_than_two_days_warning: Warning: The date is less than two days away!
less_than_two_days_warning_occational: Warning: The time between the two tests can exceed 120 hours when using the occasional model.

landing.title: Get precise interpretations on Cannabis tests with ease
landing.subtitle: Easy to use, clear interpretations, readable graph, printable, and much more...

FAQ.sendEmail: Then send an email to the address below, and we will post the question and the answer here so everyone can benefit from it.

toast.error_date: The date is before the previous date entered.

common.too_small_screen: The screen size is too small. It must be at least 992px wide. If you are using an iPad, try turning it.

defaultAnswers.title: No results to show
defaultAnswers.text: Enter a test result to calculate a result
defaultAnswers.outside: The 30-day span for the model has been exceeded, therefore the result is only advisory

case1.title: The model cannot predict the result yet.
case1.text: Take the next test in 5 days.
case1.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber}.

case2.title: The model cannot predict the result yet.
case2.text: Take the next test at least 2 days later.
case2.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber}.

case3.title: Value is outside the model's range (0.9 to 132 mg/mol).
case3.text: The test value is too low for the model. Low values of this size can be interpreted as the excretion of residues from previous substance use, which are stored in the adipose tissue.
case3.calculation: The model is out of range based on test no. {testNumber}.

case4.title: Value is outside the model's range (0.9 to 132 mg/mol).
case4.text: The test value on {date} is too high, and a decrease must be awaited before the model can be used. Repeated high values can be considered signs of continued substance use.
case4.calculation: The model is out of range based on test no. {testNumber}.

case5.title: Value is outside the model's range (0.9 to 132 mg/mol).
case5.text: The test value is too low for the model. Low values of this size can be interpreted as the excretion of residues from previous substance use, stored in adipose tissue. NOTE: There is therefore no sign of new intake.
case5.calculation: The model is out of range based on test no. {testNumber}.

case6.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber1} and test no. {testNumber2}

case6_1.title: Sign of new intake
case6_1.text: There is evidence of new use. The next calculation will be based on the test from {date}.

case6_2.title: Sign of new intake.
case6_2.text: There is evidence of new use. The next calculation will be based on the test from {date}.

case6_3.title: Risk of false prediction of new intake
case6_3.text: NOTE: There is a possibility of a false positive prediction for up to 14 days from the test on {date}, so take the next test after {nextDate}, after which the model will be accurate.

case6_4_1.title: Sign of new intake
case6_4_1.text: There is evidence of new use. The next calculation will be based on the test from {date}.

case6_4_2.title: New test required. The model cannot yet predict a result. There is a risk of false prediction of new intake.
case6_4_2.text: NOTE: The result from the model is uncertain. Take the next test at least 2 days later. The next test result will be calculated based on the test from {date}. The model should then be accurate.

case6_5.title: No sign of new cannabis use.
case6_5.text: There is no evidence of new cannabis use between {date1} and {date2}. The next test will still be calculated based on the test from {date1}.
case6_5.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber1} and test no. {testNumber2}.

case7.title: First test
case7.text: The test value on {date} is the first entered test. Enter another test to see a result.
case7.calculation: The model currently has only one test.

case8.title: No sign of new cannabis use.
case8.text: There is no evidence of new cannabis use between {date1} and {date2}. Using the model for sporadic use, the next test will be calculated based on the most recent test, which means it is the test from {date2}.
case8.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber1} and test no. {testNumber2}.

case9.title: Sign of new cannabis use.
case9.text: There is evidence of new cannabis use between {date1} and {date2}. The next test will be calculated based on the test from {date2}.
case9.calculation: The model has given the following result based on test no. {testNumber1} and test no. {testNumber2}.

case10.title: The time between the two tests is too short
case10.text: The number of hours between the tests is too low for the model. Therefore, take a new test.
case10.calculation: The model cannot provide a result based on the short interval between the following dates {date1} and {date2}.

case11.title: The time between the two tests is too long
case11.text: The number of hours between the tests is too high for the model. Therefore, take a new test no more than 120 hours after the most recent test.
case11.calculation: The model cannot provide a result based on the long interval between the following dates {date1} and {date2}.
